detail_desc: Boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and sparkly stones around the lenses. UV-protective, tinted lenses.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub-cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Fully lined bikinis. Triangle top with an adjustable strap at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bikini bottoms.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra top in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Shirt in a striped viscose weave with a grandad collar, French front and pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a narrow, decorative frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Recycled polyester lining.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Short lace dress with a V-neck at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck with decorative gathers. Tie-top shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Set with a top and pair of puff pants in a soft weave. Top with an elasticated neckline and short cap sleeves. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and elasticated, frill-trimmed hems.

Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a high paper bag waist. Relaxed fit with covered elastication at the waist, a fastening with two press-studs at the front and a fake fly. Front pockets, back pockets and tapered legs.

Lace bralette with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and narrow elastication under the bust and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a stand-up collar with a chin guard and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Fake pockets at the top, flap patch pockets with a press-stud, and a small single back vent. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar and straight hem.
Slippers in soft, patterned jersey with jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles with anti-slip protectors.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Wide, straight-cut, knee-length shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Low dropped shoulders and long, voluminous balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and above the hem. Unlined.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured weave with pleats at the top, a zip at the back and side pockets.

Saddle bag in imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a metal fastener. One inner compartment and a detachable narrow metal chain shoulder strap with an imitation leather section on the shoulder. Lined. Size 7x14.5x17.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in soft, patterned viscose jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with a frill around the armholes.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool decorated with imitation pearls. High collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with embroidered details, a regular waist, zip fly with a button and raw-edge hems.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a square neckline, long sleeves, buttons down the front and a peplum at the hem.
Loafers in soft imitation leather with a moccasin seam at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and pleats at the front. Fake fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Kids Exclusive. Mittens in soft, rib-knit wool. Lined in soft cotton jersey.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in an airy viscose weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Tunic in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons at the top, short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Earrings in hammered metal with a large, pearly plastic bead. Length 4 cm.
Cap in cotton twill with padded appliqués at the top and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Romper suit in an airy, crinkled cotton weave with a round neckline, buttons down the front and short raglan sleeves. Patch front pockets, a gathered seam at the top and covered elastication at the hems. Unlined.

Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, lacing at the top, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short dolman sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Short, high-waisted skirt in woven fabric that is fitted at the top with a concealed zip in one side and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Short, flounced dress in an airy weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem.
Pointelle vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes, and a small satin bow at the front.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains decorated with pendants. Adjustable length 45-53 cm.
Fully lined bikini top in an asymmetric cut with one wide and one narrow shoulder strap and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastener at the back.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a wide neckline and short sleeves with tie details.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Ankle-length treggings in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with a ribbed, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Knitted cardigan with a diagonal zip down the front, long sleeves with ribbed sections at the top and pockets in the side seams.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, seam centre front and a twisted detail at the hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Metal earrings with a plastic stone at the top and metal discs at the bottom. Length 8 cm.
5-pocket jeans in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover, ribbed V-neck and low dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a textured-knit wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Off-the-shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a decorative seam with glittery thread at the side.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and decorative bar-shaped bead at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut hem.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long dress in viscose jersey with a lace bodice. Wide neckline with a V-neck at the back, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
Bucket bag in braided paper straw with a shoulder strap, drawstring at the top and zipped inner compartment. Lined. Diameter approx 17 cm, width 21 cm, height 22 cm.
